subject: IPv6 Linux CIFS Howto
body:
For anyone who is interested I have written up some brief instructions on
how to IPv6 enable the Linux CIFS client. Hope these are helpful! Let me
know if you have any questions or comments. 

 

The how to is at http://www.ipv6consultancy.com/ipv6blog/?p=19.

 

By the way the IPv6 enabled Linux CIFS client works with all the IPv6
capable CIFS servers I have tested. This includes, Windows XP, Windows
Server 2003 R2, Windows Vista and Windows Server 2008 Beta 3.

 

Regards,

David
